review: I used this little stuff for about two weeks and it is really amazing.  I recommend this little electronics machine. It works perfectly as advertised. But every one should be aware that you need to purchasea source of streaming for the program to watch. In fact you can still stream from you tube but it had no that much HD films.  There fore you should subscribe other sources like Netflix as I did for 7.99 a.month.  Another important thing you should verify before you purchase this item is your Internet speed.

review: Nothing is good about this device. Google tag was enough for me to try it but i am only disappointed. Nothing really worked, the streaming break so often that my wife got irritated and decided to watch rather on her 21" desktop than 55" TV. I was frustrated. It don't have much apps and mostly you can stream your browser. $30 looks too much for this useless device. I thought of asking my friends who have used to rule out the chances of defective piece but atleast 3 people i asked, they also had same experience and choose to return the device, i eventually returned the piece.
